summary: Tsukasa got into a severe car accident when she was a high school student. She still suffers from the effects of that accident, with memory impairment and needing to use a wheelchair. ... See full summary »
cast: Keiko Kitagawa|Ryô Nishikido|Jun Fubuki|Aya Hirayama|Yusuke Kamiji|Masataka Kubota|Jun Kunimura|Takumi Saitoh|Eriko Satô|Megumi Satô|Jimon Terakado|Kazue Tsunogae
title: Dakishimetai: Shinjitsu no monogatari
